Package de.gnwi.mfsim.gui.chart

Class DataArrayChart

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.gui.chart.DataArrayChart
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChartInterface
public class DataArrayChart extends Object implements ChartInterface
A chart for displaying an array of different datas
Author:
Jan-Mathis Hein

  • Constructor Details

    • DataArrayChart

      public DataArrayChart(XyChartDataManipulator[] aXyChartDataManipulatorArray, String aTitle, String aXAxisLabel, String aYAxisLabel, int aNumberToAverage, double[] aChartRange)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      aXyChartDataManipulatorArray - An array with XyChartDataManipulators for the chart
      aTitle - Title for the chart
      aXAxisLabel - X axis label for the chart
      aYAxisLabel - Y axis label for the chart
      aNumberToAverage - Number of y-values to average
      aChartRange - Chart range (may be null then optimum chart range is evaluated)

    • setHasLastPointMarked

      public void setHasLastPointMarked(boolean aHasLastPointMarked)
      Sets whether the last point of the chart is marked or not and updates the chart accordingly
      Parameters:
      aHasLastPointMarked - True: The chart's last point is marked, false: It is not

    • setHasTrendLine

      public void setHasTrendLine(boolean aHasTrendLine)
      Sets whether the chart has a trend line or not and updates the chart accordingly
      Parameters:
      aHasTrendLine - True: This chart has a trend line, false: It has not

    • setIsFillColorWhite

      public void setIsFillColorWhite(boolean anIsFillColorWhite)
      Sets whether the fill color of the shapes is white or black
      Parameters:
      anIsFillColorWhite - True: The fill color is white, false: The fill color is black. If the last point is marked its fill color is the opposite

    • setIsInverted

      public void setIsInverted(boolean anIsInverted)
      Sets whether the chart's colors are inverted
      Parameters:
      anIsInverted - True: The colors of the chart are inverted, false: They are not

    • setIsOutlinePaintWhite

      public void setIsOutlinePaintWhite(boolean anIsOutlinePaintWhite)
      Sets whether the outline paint of all shapes is white or black
      Parameters:
      anIsOutlinePaintWhite - True: The outline paint is white, false: The outline paint is black

    • setIsShapePaint

      public void setIsShapePaint(boolean anIsShapePaint)
      Sets whether data points in the chart are painted as shapes or not
      Parameters:
      anIsShapePaint - True: The data points are painted as shapes, false: The data points are not painted as shapes

    • setIsThickLines

      Parameters:
